title: Is Morgan Stanley the best or is Goldman Sachs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s begin with the presumption that you refer to investment banking services. The quality of service you receive from either of these firms can be expected to be world class. The specifics of that answer will depend on the person who serves you but you can be sure that your Goldman Sachs banker or his peer across the street will be a graduate of one of the world’s leading schools and somebody with great skill and experience. You’ll be well served at either company. If you are genuinely qualified to be a prospective customer for their services, the competition for your business is very high and you can expect a lot for your money.
Getting laid off from Goldman is like being traded by the Yankees. You'll probably still make millions, but it's just not the same. (C) GS elevator.  You get it.
